totaltime.label: Time Field
totaltime.helpText: Place the field ID to store the total time in

timehistory.label: History Field
timehistory.helpText: Place the field ID to store history of recorded time

start_threshold.label: Treshold Field
start_threshold.helpText: Seconds to wait before blocking the Save button (default: 15)

date_format.label: Date Format
date_format.helpText: Please enter one of the following date formats: dd-mm-yyyy, mm-dd-yyyy or yyyy-mm-dd

block_save_interval.label: Lock Interval
block_save_interval.helpText: Seconds to wait after a time submission before blocking the Save button (default: 5)

active_on_new.label: Active on new ticket?
active_on_new.helpText: If checked, you will be able to register time for 'New' ticket

custom_time_format.label: Custom Time Format
custom_time_format.helpText: Choose a format for time submission. HH:MM or MM (default: HH:MM).

app.description: This is a simple time tracker that counts the time a ticket is open and requires Agents to submit this time before letting them them update ticket.
app.name: Time Tracking
